content.webTitle: Boris Johnson's bus competition winners exhibited at transport museum

fields.headline: Boris's Bus (A Political Journey) Part 14: Winning Exhibits
fields.bodyText: From Transport for London: The 27 prize winning designs in the A New Bus for London competition will be on display in a free exhibition at London Transport Museum from Saturday 14 February. It will be open every Saturday and Sunday from 10.00 till 18.00 and every Friday from 18.30 till 21.00 from tomorrow until 29 March. I like the part in the press release about what happens next: The winning designs are being passed to bus manufacturers, who will combine them with their expertise in bus design to develop proposals for the final design of the new bus. Still plenty of mileage in this saga. Have a good weekend.
